message_1:
A salesman needs to visit 5 different cities. He wants to find the most efficient route possible that will allow him to visit all 5 cities once and return to his starting point with the minimum distance traveled. The distances between the cities are as follows:

City A to City B: 10 km
City A to City C: 15 km
City A to City D: 8 km
City A to City E: 20 km
City B to City C: 11 km
City B to City D: 7 km
City B to City E: 18 km
City C to City D: 12 km
City C to City E: 14 km
City D to City E: 9 km

What is the shortest distance that the salesman can travel on this trip?
message_2:
To find the shortest distance, we need to consider all possible routes and calculate the total distance for each route. There are 5 cities, so there are 4! (factorial) = 24 possible routes, considering that the salesman will return to the starting city.

Here are the possible routes and their total distances:

1. A-B-C-D-E-A: 10 + 11 + 12 + 9 + 20 = 62 km
2. A-B-C-E-D-A: 10 + 11 + 14 + 9 + 8 = 52 km
3. A-B-D-C-E-A: 10 + 7 + 12 + 14 + 20 = 63 km
4. A-B-D-E-C-A: 10 + 7 + 9 + 14 + 15 = 55 km
5. A-B-E-C-D-A: 10 + 18 + 14 + 12 + 8 = 62 km
6. A-B-E-D-C-A: 10 + 18 + 9 + 12 + 15 = 64 km
7. A-C-B-D-E-A: 15 + 11 + 7 + 9 + 20 = 62 km
8. A-C-B-E-D-A: 15 + 11 + 18 + 9 + 8 = 61 km
9. A-C-D-B-E-A: 15 + 12 + 7 + 18 + 20 = 72 km
10. A-C-D-E-B-A: 15 + 12 + 9 + 18 + 10 = 64 km
11. A-C-E-B-D-A: 15 + 14 + 18 + 7 + 8 = 62 km
12. A-C-E-D-B-A: 15 + 14 + 9 + 7 + 10 = 55 km
13. A-D-B-C-E-A: 8 + 10 + 11 + 14 + 20 = 63 km
14. A-D-B-E-C-A: 8 + 10 + 18 + 14 + 15 = 65 km
15. A-D-C-B-E-A: 8 + 12 + 11 + 18 + 20 = 69 km
16. A-D-C-E-B-A: 8 + 12 + 14 + 18 + 10 = 62 km
17. A-D-E-B-C-A: 8 + 9 + 18 + 11 + 15 = 61 km
18. A-D-E-C-B-A: 8 + 9 + 14 + 11 + 10 = 52 km
19. A-E-B-C-D-A: 20 + 18 + 11 + 12 + 8 = 69 km
20. A-E-B-D-C-A: 20 + 18 + 7 + 12 + 15 = 72 km
21. A-E-C-B-D-A: 20 + 14 + 11 + 7 + 8 = 60 km
22. A-E-C-D-B-A: 20 + 14 + 12 + 7 + 10 = 63 km
23. A-E-D-B-C-A: 20 + 9 + 10 + 11 + 15 = 65 km
24. A-E-D-C-B-A: 20 + 9 + 12 + 11 + 10 = 62 km

The shortest distance is 52 km, which can be achieved by following either route 2 (A-B-C-E-D-A) or route 18 (A-D-E-C-B-A).
